001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.Coin;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.Sha256Hash;
005import org.bitcoinj.script.Script;
006
007/**
008 * Interface for commonly-used UTXO information, for example the {@code prevtxs} parameter of
009 * the {@code signrawtransactionwithwallet} JSON-RPC request.
010 */
011public interface UtxoInfo {
012    Sha256Hash getTxid();
013
014    int getVout();
015
016    Script getScriptPubKey();
017
018    String getRedeemScript();
019
020    String getWitnessScript();
021
022    Coin getAmount();
023}
